overview: Vic realizes she must come out when her friends, Jen and Kylie, start pushing her to date a man. One hiccup, Vic is terrified of coming out and tells her friend Ruth she plans to go full les in hopes her friends figure it out on their own. In her crusade, Vic tries out iconic lesbian looks and embraces every lesbian stereotype on the planet in hopes of avoiding the inevitable.
tagline: A young lesbian doesn't want to deal with an awkward coming out talk, so she acts increasingly gay in hopes her friends figure it out.
title: Coming Out
